data.title: Mecat2
data.description: ultra-fast and accurate de novo assembly tools for SMRT reads
data.name: MECAT2

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "**Before running `MECAT2`, don't forget to add binary paths to `PATH` (Step 3 of [Installation](#S-installation)).**"
"MECAT2 is an improved version of MECAT. It is an ultra-fast and accurate Mapping, Error Correction and de novo Assembly Tools for single molecula sequencing (SMRT) reads."

Quick Start shows users running commands like `mecat.pl correct`, `mecat.pl trim`, `mecat.pl assemble` to assemble an E. coli genome, indicating it is an end-user analysis/assembly application producing contigs.
